answerText: scope [prompt on visibility][10] These are variables that can be accessed anywhere in the program. They contrast with local variables.

subject: Science
question: Question: This property of a variable can be lexical or dynamic. For 10 points each: [10] Name this region of a program in which a particular variable can be seen and accessed.
